Articles.Content:
Newsticker

------------------------------------------------------------------

[kknws] Kaiser Konzern announces the new KaiserKraft Engineering Mark I Rocket. It will not only launch to the Orbit, the Wissenschaftler are sure to reach out to the Mun. Stay tuned for further Nachrichten from the Kaiser Konzern.

KaiserKraft, because your Zukunft matters!

------------------------------------------------------------------

[kknws] Kaiser Konzern announces that we hire a new PR Leader for our stolzes translation department. Totally unrelated: Our Former PR Leader Heinrich Meier is missing since the last burnout test of our new KaiserKraft Mark III Engine.

Stay tuned for further Nachrichten from the Kaiser Konzern.

KaiserKraft, because your Zukunft matters!
